summary: So a while ago I tweeted this photo of my dog to RDJ and said if he ever saw it I'd make her a suit.  Long story short, he wound...
body:
Iron Dog

So a while ago I tweeted this photo of my dog to RDJ and said if he ever saw it I’d make her a suit. Long story short, he wound up posting it on Facebook. SO without further ado, I give you Pepper (me) and Iron Dog.

reblog.comment:
Iron Dog

title: Iron Man (2008)
body:
#IronMan (2008)

Tony Stark is a genius, billionaire, playboy, and philanthropist. He’s the son of legendary inventor and weapons contractor Howard Stark. When Tony Stark is assigned to give a weapons presentation to an Iraqi unit led by Lt. Col. James Rhodes, he’s given a ride on enemy lines. That ride ends badly when Stark’s Humvee that he’s riding in is attacked by enemy combatants. He survives – barely – with…

View On WordPress

blog.name: heartbreakhotel16
blog.title: Heartbreak Hotel
blog.description: Down at the end of Lonely Street and Heartbreak Hotel. Writing is therapy for the soul. Reading is the drug the therapist gives you.

title: Avengers Academy
body:
Chapter 19:

WARNING: THIS IS THE SADDEST BUT SHORTEST PART. HAVE TISSUES NEARBY. “Hello Peter. How was your day?” Karen’s voice said. “Haha it was great. You know Laura? Yeah she, she’s just amazing. Her and I uh you know, kissed. Best kiss I ever had.” Laura looked up.

Karen was playing every clip of their conversations. “Karen?” He asked. “Yes Peter?” “I’m going to admit this and I can’t even tell anyone. I’m just so scared. But I think I love Laura. But there’s just so many roadblocks as to why we can’t be together.” He paused.

“If I ever get hurt please show her this.” It went from showing him the mirror to inside the mask. “Laura if I’m ever hurt and you get to see this, I’m sorry. I’m sorry I wasn’t able to help you. I’m sorry I failed you.” There was a pause as he inhaled. It sounded like he was tearing up.

“Please don’t ever think that I was too nervous to ask you out. I’m pretty sure you and I had the same reasons as to why we couldn’t be together. Just know that… that I-I love you. Remember this forever. With great power comes great responsibility.”

Then it ended. She was so weak from sobbing and being beat she was becoming faint. Due to the matter in her body she was healing extremely slow. Laura now lay on the floor holding onto his body. Before she passed out she said “he loved me. I love you Peter.” Then everything went black.

by KristensHollow

Drabble series based on Spider-man: Homecoming. “This time on season two of Peter screws the pooch…” “Misser Starr?” Peter groaned, looking up at his mentor… Peter honestly would have given anything for the older man to just disappear from this embarrassing situation.

title: Thunderstruck
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NHFd23

by complaining_is_cathartic

Tony Stark is the epitome of ‘prim and proper.’ His outfits (never anything less than a button down and slacks) are always pressed to perfection, his glasses perched carefully on his nose, his head held high, and his lips maintained in a thin, expression-less line. As the famous Howard Stark’s son, not even one hair can be out of place, lest the tabloids sully his name. So, of course, Steve would be surprised when he saw the genius practically jumping all over the stage of a karaoke bar, singing a rock song of all things.

Or in which Tony secretly rebels against Howard’s harsh discipline and gets caught by Steve.

Words: 1168, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Works that I say might become multi-chapter, but probably won’t

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark (Implied)
  • Additional Tags: Steve is in denial, Tony is adorkable, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Tony is a lot more restrained in this one, college tony, College Steve, One-Shot


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NHFd23

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Hidden Secrets
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PxtPGx

by daughterofthebillionaire

The two Starks were the only family the other had left. Secrets were rarely kept, especially after Tony was rescued from his kidnapping last year.

Six months ago, he came out as Iron Man. His daughter, Leighton, had invented her own suit that Fury had jokingly dubbed Iron Princess.

She thought it had a nice ring to it.

Words: 265, Chapters: 1/13, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Iron Princess

blog.name: thevanillahorizon
blog.title: Socially Awkward
blog.description:
I'm twenty, sort of artistic, I have an obsession with fictional reformed bad guys and enjoy writing fanfiction.

((Ravenclaw pride))

title: What they smell like
body:
Tony Stark:
When he’s around the compound he usually smells like oil, spray paint or gasoline due to the amount of time he spends working on his suits, cars, etc.
When expecting company, or when he goes out he always smells like his favorite expensive cologne, and occasionally hair gel.

Steve Rogers:
Most of the time he only faintly smells like shaving cream, but usually Steve has a more neutral scent, not really liking scented soaps, he has also been known to smell like various fruits on occasion, since he likes eating healthy and all.

Thor:
He has the natural smell of thunderstorms and rain around him, understandable considering what he’s the god of, alternatively he has been known to smell like a campfire oddly enough.

Bruce:
Bruce smells like antiseptics, but not overwhelming, nothing like a hospital, but faintly, underneath whatever subtle cologne he is wearing that day.
He has to be careful what cologne he wears though, a few brands have been known to give the hulk an allergic reaction, which has more than once ended with a very irritated hulk scratching his back against the walls.

Clint Barton:
Clint has been known to, oddly enough, smell like nature itself, pine trees, honeysuckle, waterlilies and all that.

Natasha:
Fun fact, Natasha doesn’t keep the same scent very long, usually changing up her shampoo or bodywash scent every mission or so, since that’s what she has gotten used to in some of her training, never keep the same scent too long.
Among the various scents she has used though Japanese cherry blossom seems to pop up more often than other scents.

Loki:
His natural scent is icy and cold, like a blizzard, but it’s a pleasant and subtle scent, aside from that scent, he has sometimes been said to smell like peppermints or to even have the pleasant aroma of leather, although that’s probably just the armor.
An anonymous source said when she seen him last on Midgard that he “smelled like mint chocolate icecream, good enough to eat” and I’m not going to comment on that statement because what I want to say could be taken as weird.

Sam Wilson:
God blessed us with this cutie, he smells like baby lotion most of the time, for god sakes, can it get any better?

James Rhodes:
He smells like the ocean, or a beach, just any beautiful body of water honestly.

Director Fury:
No one has ever been brave enough to inhale, much less sniff around Nick Fury, but if I had to guess, I bet he smells dangerous, maybe like a room full of polished knives, or a freshly discharged gun.
Perhaps he smells like synthetic leather or essential oils, but maybe he smells like explosives or a taser.
No one may ever truly know.

Bucky Barnes:
Unlike Steve, he loves scented soaps, one scent he really enjoys is strawberries, sure, he was an assassin and all, but that doesn’t mean he can’t smell like strawberries now since he’s got his mind back.
I also dare you to give him shit about his hair smelling like strawberry conditioner, I DARE YOU.

T'challa:
I didn’t know someone could smell like satin bedsheets, but this king smells like satin bedsheets.
I DIDN’T EVEN KNOW SATIN BEDSHEETS HAD A SCENT?
Either Way, I believe angels probably smell like him.

Scott Lang:
He sort of always smells like a bakery or something.
Either he smells like cinnamon rolls, brownies, freshly baked cookies or a chocolate cake, and everything sweet in between.

Vision:
Can a walking toaster even smell like anything other than a walking toaster? I mean, I guess he sort of smells like one of those internet cafes.

Stephen Strange:
He smells like an antique store, a library sort of, and tea.
This handsome man literally smells like tea and books.
HE SMELLS LIKE MY PERFECT WEEKEND.

Peter Parker:
Aside from the shampoo he uses, which totally smells amazing, he always seems to subtly smell like a bubblegum flavored dum dum sucker, my favorite kind.

Wanda:
She usually smells like wildflowers, maybe it’s the perfume she uses, the same brand her mother used, or maybe its an essential oil she uses, who knows.

blog.name: theavengers
blog.title: GODS AT DUSK
blog.description:
Welcome to "The Avengers", a fansite dedicated to the Marvel Cinematic Universe and your source for all things related to it!

WE'RE NOT A SPOILER-FREE BLOG.
Please check our FAQ before asking!

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description:
Father, trophy husband, retired Avenger. Ask away.

I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me

Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments

Discord Join Link
